content.detailedDescription: I took several pictures while awaiting the launch of the most recent atlas rocket from cape canaveral.  upon review of my pictures, one i took of a helicopter has a clear disc shaped object just off the nose of the copter in the picture.  clearly this was closed airspace, and the object seems too distant and high to be a bird.  i was unaware i caught the object in the picture until i reviewed it the next day.
content.summary: Took picture of helicoptor at recent atlas launch.  zoomed pic and found unknown object in front of copter's nose

content.detailedDescription: Had just gotten home and noticed a bright light to my north east. as i stood and watched it get closer to me, i could see that the entire object was glowing. no blinking lights at all. as it was just about overhead, i snapped a photo of it. it was totally silent and was very bright and boomerang shaped. the entire craft was illuminated and appeared to be a golden color with a mix of amber. as i watched it go overhead, it began to bank to the right and at this time, i snapped a second picture of it. about half way through its turn, the rear of it brightened and it increased its speed so dramatically, i was barely able to keep my eyes on it. the craft sped out of site toward the south west. i'm located in kernersville, nc and there are two airports west and east of me. i see airplanes daily and i can say 100% that this was not an airplane. it's sheer speed amazed me not to mention that it was totally silent. i don't know what it was, but i know what it wasn't!!
content.summary: Silent craft/ufo photographed in north carolina

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were sitting at a local school down the street from our homes,when i saw a very bright light seemed like miles away moving up and down. i pointed it out to debbie, my girl friend and then all of a sudden it seemed like it zoomed straight at us. we got scared and started to get ready to run, when all of a sudden this really bright red light flooded the area we were in, and as we ran up the street, i noticed that the heavy snow on the ground was melted. i saw her to her house and then i ran across the street to my house. i told my parents what had happened and they did not believe me. i was scared out of my mind and no one believed me. the next morning every exposed area of skin was like a bad sunburn and when i pointed this out i was told it was wind burn. i never told any one about this after i was not believed. and this is not the last time i have seen something.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was light in sky, then came directly at us got real bright melted snow burned us

content.detailedDescription:
Over a weekend trip to miami beach, my boyfriend & i decided to set his canon 7d to do a time lapse to see the sunrise. a week or so later we go back round to the video to look at it. about a third or so into the video (when the sun is coming up) i notice something strange on the video. a cigar shaped cloud appear to be effortlessly drifting by. so i sk him to slow down the video, as it is on time lapse mood. when he does it appears the cloud has lights in it. so i ask him if he can take a snapshot of it & enlarge the pic & he does. then it becomes obvious that is a clever devise that is hiding the fact that there are tiny lights inside of it. i have him take a few more snapshoots of it & in a few of the different pic you can see that the lights are changing colors...
now i am willing to believe this some type of top secret military devise... just tell me that, please...
i am attaching the video to this report but it is in time lapse mood so when viewed you'd have to slow it down to view it a little after the time the sun starts to rise a little to the left hand side of the screen...
content.summary: What is that?

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting outside (3 of us) at campfire around 1am and we saw a yellow-orange light coming from the west crossing our field of vision of the lake.  it was moving slow in a straight line east, then after a few minutes it veered north-east, started to ascend on a gradual angle, then accelerated (we are assuming because it quickly started shrinking in size like it was flying away from us).  we first thought it was a chinese lantern of some sort, but the size of it (aspirin size) over the lake from 500ft out would have made the thing huge. the only other thing that made sense was maybe a large meteor that just missed the earth, but it was completed silent, no breaking of the sound barrier, and no fireball/trail/flash.
content.summary: Yellow-orange light over lake in manitoba narrows

content.detailedDescription: It wasnt some big event that i observed, more like an accidental picture of something really strange... i was snapping pictures of the beautiful colors and textures created in the clouds by the sun setting. i take three pictures at a time for quality assurance, i didnt really notice what i caught until 20 mins later when i showed my wife what great pictures i took. then we came across the picture im talking about, and we were baffled as to what it could be... i took two similar pictures before and the object was not there in the sky.. there were no birds around cause there arent any trees on this side of town, not really enough for much bird activity. so i posted it on facebook and a cousin of my wife showed me a story of a black cube coming from what seemed to be a portal, which also happened in el paso, tx. more than one story of this instance as well, so i thought why not go ahead and put mine as well.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the clouds with the sun setting and i snapped a picture and caught something else by accident.

content.detailedDescription: My wife(girlfriend at the time), and i were star gazing at the time, in a spot we liked due to a wide sky view. soon into our gazing, we noticed a pulsating light. (yellow, white and orange). it could also be describbed as orb-like. it descended, then ascended, a few times and sarah( the girl with me) was extremely excited. i held reserve, just because i didnt think these motions were too, "outlandish", but, what really has meconvinced that this is an authentic ufo was what immediately followed. it ascended one final time, and began to grow far brighter, and when it peaked in it's brightness, it seporated into two orbs. when this occured it's movements became much more complex. one orb remained stationary and the other rotated around it, at a relatively fast speed too. then, the rotating orb stopped and then the other orb stayed stationary while the opposing orb rotated, they completely switched functions. then they both dimmed, and joined back together. the light peaked again and again they seporated, the both descended and ascended adjacent to one another, and on their ascent they joined together one last time. to the far left in the sky, we then heard the whopping of a helicopter,it was dark with no lights on the front nor the back like they usually have. as soon as it got close to the orb('s), they pulsed and disappeared really fast. and the helicopter just kept flying and soon was out of sight and could not be heard. what happened next i'm not sure what it was, but within 20 seconds after both the orbs and the helicopter disappeared  there was this terrible smell all around us, extremely foul and right as we both smelled it we became very uneasy, scared and felt the need to flee. we got off the top of the car and left. finaly, the next day we returned to the same dirt road that came to the field we were in and there was a single large pale green military "humvee" (if that is how you spell it). but as soon as we saw a military vehicle, we knew we had betteer leave. but look up windber pa. the closest place to get a vehicle like that is at least 30 miles away, and it had no reason to be on this old dirt road in the middle of nowhere, and its not like they just lend these things out. but, that is our experience. strange, not as extreme as some other stories i've heard but still very unsettling.
content.summary: Ufo spotted by 2 wittnesses, descended/ascended, took off.

content.detailedDescription: While walking my dog on the night of july 19th at approx. 21:20 in brookhaven, pa. i looked up to observe at least 20 aircraft? military? with blinking lights and what looked like a halo of glowing light around each one. they were flying very high. there was another aircraft flying in the area that was at a much lower altitude. they were all headed in the same direction which i think was ne. another neighbor also observed this with me. eventually they disappeared from sight.
content.summary: Approx 20 aircraft flying very high observed in the sky. flying mostly in straight formation. glowing halo with blinking lights. could not make out the body of aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were returning from night out and walking a short distance home. my wife noticed a bright light and took a snap on her mobile.  we walked a short way to my doorway and i took a photo.  we then noticed there were several objects and the largest began to descend slowly. we studied the photos next day and when zooming in they did not appear to resemble any aircraft.  i continued to watch the objects for a little while before entering the house.  we were not frightened however my wife was amazes as she is normally sceptical.  it would be interesting to have some kind of explanation. i am 62 years old and my wife 59.
content.summary: Multiple bright lights in a clear sky at night.  the largest seemed to move slowly

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were sitting on the steps of our house in winona, minnesota. i saw a very bright light in the sky straight ahead of us in the west and then realized it was traveling right slowly. i said something to my friend who immediately agreed she saw the light, too, then she commented that there was another less bright light to the left that seemed to trail the first light. they appeared to be about an inch away from each other, both going the same speed and maintaining their distances from each other. we watched for about a minute as these lights traveled and appeared to fad . right before they faded into nothing, we saw the second duller light shoot off in an odd, downward trajectory. it appeared to go down and right at a much faster speed than it had been traveling at. then the lights disappeared completely. my friend and i were very taken aback and surprised at what we had see . i thought the lights were just white, but she described them as having an orange tint. about am hour later, i was sitting outside with another friend and i witnessed a fireball in the north falling quickly above the bluffs. it was very large and white, traveling very quickly. i saw it turn orange and green and become brighter before it quickly burnt out. i was the only witness to this second event. i'm not sure if these two events have correlation, but i had never seen anything like either of them. i felt somewhat uneasy after the events, but i think that's normal.
content.summary: Twp bright lights traveling on a straight course before fading. one shot off in an irregular trajectory

content.detailedDescription: A bright red-orange ball was seen by two neighbors and i between 10:30 pm and midnight on july 4th 2015, just after the fireworks. the object was moving faster than a plane and in a straight line headed nw. we were able to follow the ball in the sky visually for a good two minutes by just moving our position a bit in the front yard... we all continued to make comments and follow it with our eyes before it just disappeared. it never dimmed or flashed, just vanished out of sight.
content.summary: A bright red-orange ball was seen by two neighbors and i between 10:30 pm and midnight on july 4th 2015. it was moving faster than a plane and in a straight line headed nw then just disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Era noite de segunda feira, dia 21 de julho de 2015, estava com meus dois filhos de 9 e 11 anos e um sobrinho de 10 anos brincando no segundo andar da cobertura onde moramos em niterói— rio de janeiro(brasil), eu sempre acreditei em ufo's. por volta de 21:30, avistei um objeto totalmente diferente do que jamais vi na minha vida, tinha uma forma de bumerangue, a parte superior era vermelha e a inferior prateada, ele se movimentava lentamente e estava bem próximo, o seu tamanho era enorme, do tamanho de um campo de futebol, eu me senti muito feliz por ter a oportunidade de ver um ufo, algo que achava muito difícil de acontecer, chamei às crianças e elas pegaram o celular para tirar foto e filmar, nesse momento ele tinha se afastado um pouco mas foi possível capturar a imagem e filmar, o ufo fez um movimento circular, movimentos irregulares, se inclinou em direção ao espaço e em grande velocidade desapareceu.
content.summary: Avistamos pela área externa um ufo que movimentava lentamente e estava bem próximo seu tamanho era de um campo de futebol, fez um movimento circular em direção ao espaço e sumiu fazendo movimentos irregulares.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i went to the west end of the sabino canyon parking lot in tucson on 7/4/15 and we set up night vision cameras for a ufo night watch since we're enthusiasts.  at approx. 8:45 pm we saw over the catalina mtns. to the ne a bright medium sized star which would be impossible due to multi layers of heavy clouds.  also airplanes never have their headlights on over areas of wilderness as far out as this light was.

i immediately turned my camera on (i have a luna optics color night vision camera).  i have the camera running to a 7" monitor and both are tripod mounted.  the light was seen in the monitor as 2 lights close together on the horizontal and to the right of these lights (from my perspective) there were huge flashes of bright blue light.  as the lights sat stationary for a couple of minutes a 3rd light began to be seen between the two.

i'll let the video speak for all the events that happened after that since they are too numerous to detail.  the main things to notice are at the very beginning my camera swings to the right just enough to pick up the radio towers on the top of the catalinas that are about 8 to 10 miles from where my camera was set up.  they are out of focus yet the lights in the sky are in focus.  i have the focus set for clarity of stars and satellites.  jets that are 20 to 40 miles away are in focus in the night sky as well.  thus we estimate that this object (or more likely 3 independent objects) is probably 30 to 40 miles away and can't be too far due to it being under the heavy cloud cover.

also to notice are changes in overall lighting in the video most of which are due to car taillights as they exited the park.  about 4 minutes of the video had to be edited out due to car headlight interference washing the video out.  however, about half way through the video (at the 4:10 mark) there are seen staccato bursts of light and then the big green light appears in the sky to the left of the primary lights.  these staccato bursts are not from cars, from us or anyone else since we were isolated in the far southwest corner of a large parking lot.  i believe these lights were generated by the ufo itself since there is no other logical source. 

also to note if you look very carefully at the 5:08 mark a very faint, white ghosted image appears to the left of the mountain top and this moves across towards the original display of lights and then at 5:25 a second row of 3 lights materializes to the left of the original.  

when the primary row of lights seems to change shape and become a blurred mass of one object, that is only because i am trying to get a better focus.  the last couple of minutes of the video shows how stable these 3 primary lights actually were with no drastic changes in their shape or position in the sky.  the video ended because my camera ran out of memory.  in reality the lights stayed on in an unchanged way for another couple of minutes and then suddenly blinked out without having moved.  

my video is 8 minutes long but with the lost footage of about 4 minutes and with the ending lost the actual duration of the incident was likely 14 to 15 minutes long.  the lights again showed up 27 minutes later but this time one stationary light gradually became a horizontal row of 5 white lights with more flashing and other lights appearing and disappearing in the vicinity.  

my friend has a very poor pulsar night vision camera and he caught both events on video and although very poor some of the variables that i mentioned can still be discerned.  his night vision captures can be seen on youtube on his channel.  the second incident that happened 27 minutes later lasted approx. 9 minutes and again ended with the primary light(s) from a stationary position throughout just blinking out.

hopefully the video file i sent is watchable but if not it can be found on my youtube channel under my exact name that i've provided.
content.summary: Seen as medium star under heavy cloud cover

content.detailedDescription: Several campers in the campground at lees ferry observed the lights together for some time during the event on 7/17/15.
content.summary: Five lights seemed to interact with one another, as though dancing together, in the night sky for well over 1/2 hour

content.detailedDescription: It was 3:55 in the morning in scottsdale arizona and i stepped out into my backyard to look at the sky. i saw a star flickering to the north east and so i decided to put my focus onto that one star and within 20 seconds of focusing i saw a bright star-looking orb appear next to my star and shot straight out of the atmosphere. it made me so excited that i started jumping up and down because it just filled me up with energy. it lit up and then flashed out of sight within seconds. it looked about 3 times the size and brightness of the star that i was looking at.
content.summary: Walked outside and began to look to the northwest at a star and an orb lit up next to the star than flashed away!

content.detailedDescription: Watched a glowing object behind a tree, it came out it was stationary then it moved forward. it was white glowing, with two lights underneath. it blinked several times. i am not really sure of the   exact time
content.summary: Saw a white object move behind trees. it came out, stayed blinked and went ahead.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the roof and was feeling the cool breez of the dawn. suddenly a humming sound drew my attention to a building roof to my se corner. i could not believe my eyes. a silvery tetrahedron shaped object was hovering over the building and at the same time it was emittimg a greenish light. first i thought it was something light display, but after 2-3 minutes the humming increased and i was sure that this is an unearhtly thing. after 10 min or so it gradually shifted its path and flew to the eastern sky.
content.summary: Saw it from roof. was tetrahedral. had three wings. was hazy. green light. hovered for 10 min.

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside at work at 11:10 to get something from vehicle. saw very large yellow/orangish object due west at a distance that would have appeared to be over lake michigan (i am inland just over 2 hours). there is a cell tower around 2 miles away with the usual red light on top, it served as a good reference point because the object was to the left of it but much farther away, it was around 6 times larger (and also brighter) than the red light on top of tower. watched it for around 5 minutes as it descended heading north out of sight. 
my first thought was of how much it looked like a comet like in the movies or science shows. very strange because i do a lot of night sky photography, i've seen many fireballs, meteors, satellites etc. and this was completely different.
content.summary: Believe sighting was same object as lapeer sighting.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside (at about 22:11 cst) to smoke a cigarette.  i had earlier (about half an hour prior; 21:20 cst) observed what looked like a satellite in space traveling at a great speed, headed north.  this caught my attention to the night sky.  at about 22:13, i witnessed a helicopter headed south bound at an altitude of about 1,000 feet from surface.  this caught my attention, and i began looking at the clear night sky.  at about 22:15, i saw what first appeared to be a flock of geese headed north bound at a constant speed.  there was no noise, but the usual formation of the "geese" was very close to what would be an equilateral triangle, minus the 3rd straight line (^), and moving at a faster pace than the birds could fly.  furthermore, what i thought was the "geese formation" spread was wider than what would be expected.  as the object approached, seemingly following hwy 231, north bound, i saw the object very clearly.  the dim white light (possibly reflected light) from it disappeared as it entered a more populated area, but the ground city lights enabled a clear view of the object.  it was chevron shaped, with no fuselage, and had a rectangular protrusion on its bottom.  it was about 50 feet in length, flying at about 2,500 feet above surface at a slow and constant pace.  the object was too dark to photograph or video (i had my iphone on me).  it quietly kept on cruising north bound until i could see it no more.
content.summary: Large dark v shaped quiet slow moving object observed moving n bound into huntsville, al

content.detailedDescription:
Went out side because i like to star watch.  immediately noticed very bright pulsating light. ran in a woke up my wife and  got my binoculars.  we was watching this one when we noticedanother. getting excited we got in the car and went up to a spot in the road where we could view better. ended up seeing eleven doing various things. when looking around there were no other air traffic. after about 45min we came home to report this!

this is nothing compared to another sighting three years ago with 5 witness , glowing orange orbs and jet aircraft so low over my house thay shook the ground. it was like the orbs were waiting for them.
content.summary: Very bright colorful lights that were the brightest in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Went out side because i like to star watch.  immediately noticed very bright pulsating light. ran in a woke up my wife and  got my binoculars.  we was watching this one when we noticedanother. getting excited we got in the car and went up to a spot in the road where we could view better. ended up seeing eleven doing various things. when looking around there were no other air traffic. after about 45min we came home to report this!

this is nothing compared to another sighting three years ago with 5 witness , glowing orange orbs and jet aircraft so low over my house thay shook the ground. it was like the orbs were waiting for them.
content.summary: Very bright colorful lights that were the brightest in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I routinely smoke a cigarette at night on my deck. while outside, i like to watch the stars and see if i can observe any shooting stars or satellites. i first observed the object approximately 4:15 am, and i thought it was a satellite, until it slowed down, came to a complete stop, then changed direction. numerous times it changed direction, sped up, slowed down, stopped, then kept wiggling around the sky. it was in a high orbit, i'd guess about as high as the satellites i view regularly. also, several times i saw it reflect the light from the rising sun.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Appeared to be a satellite until it stopped and changed directions

content.detailedDescription: I was in my kitchen around 9 o'clock at night when i looked out the window and spotted this bright yellow, circular blinking light in the sky. it immediately struck me as odd and so i watched it as it came closer. it was larger than a star. i could see no actual object, just a bright blinking light. it traveled in a straight line. i told my partner about it but they didn't show much of an interest. i continued to watch. it blinked and traveled for about six minutes and then suddenly it started blinking faster and faster then it fizzled and was gone. i mentioned it again to my partner once it disappeared. and have mentioned it again just recently. this happened about a month ago and it's still fresh in my mind - i'd never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Bright yellow, circular, blinking light. travels in a straight line then fizzles, disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the steps of my apartment in olympia, wa smoking a cigarette while facing the western sky at approx. 11:30 pm pst when i observed a long cigar shaped object that was blacker than the night sky moving from the south to the north. 

i couldn't make out any features of the craft but it was completely noiseless and had one small steady white light at the rear of the object while the front had a small blinking red light. 

whatever it was, it seemed pretty large. i'd guess that it was about a mile away but if it was further away then it must have been even larger. it was moving fairly slowly at first, almost hovering when i first saw it, but then it picked up speed and disappeared behind a very large stand of trees on the adjoining property.

at first, i thought it might be a blimp for a second but when it speeded up, it moved faster than a blimp is capable of; i've seen a few of them over the years and this object speeded up more rapidly than a blimp can.

we are pretty close to joint base lewis mcchord here so i suppose it could have been military but it also met the definition of a ufo, that much is certain.
content.summary: Dark black cigar shaped object with a steady white light at one end and a blinking red light at the other end.

content.detailedDescription:
This incident is more involved than i can describe here.  i have kept it for many years.  the object is incidental to the circumstances surrounding the event.  if interested i am willing to discuss, would like some answers.

respectfully
content.summary: Glowing oval

content.detailedDescription: I was walking around a track at sierra middle school two jets cough my eye and i turned to look at what was going on and saw 3 station lights take off so fast towards the west it looked like one went one way the the other two broke the other  direction they wear blinking very fast and you can see them as they still blinked in the distance . there wear over 30 people on that track and nobody was paying any mind to what was going on so i told the first person that faced that direction and asked him if he can see the lights to confirm what i was looking at and he said yes i see the lights they look like stars  . these where not stars but blinking objects that out ran 2 jets . after the jets took off towards these objects 3 more jets  join the sky's one right after another lind some thing was wrong ? i live next to the base and to see these jets take off like they did was no exercise . i saw what i saw and believe it was 3 ufos taking off towards the west .
content.summary: Saw two jets taking off looked in the direction they wear going and saw 3 objects that looked like flashing lights take off towards the west fast and one when to nw the other 2 went west a jet went after one and the other jet went after the other 2 .

content.detailedDescription: Object was round looked like a star moving ne then bam quickly se the ne again. had to be moving faster than any jet i've ever seen. wife seen everything too then we noticed helicopters 3 and then plane flying a grid east to west literally just as the object disappeared. we decided to report to the sheriff's office. dispatch was nice about the report but i'm sure we will be seen as fruits now
content.summary: Bright moving extreamly fast!

content.detailedDescription:
Friday night, july 17 2015, vancouver wa, at approximately 11:09 pm i was at my apartment, on my south facing porch smoking a cigarette and watching the sky. i have never before this night seen what people term a ufo, and only recently became convinced of their existence. as a normal routine when i am home smoking, it is on my back porch, as i do not smoke indoors.

i was following the northward flight path of what appeared to be a commercial jet liner. it did not have flashing lights, but rather a single steady white light.  i tend to watch these types of movements, disregarding aircraft with flashing lights. as i watched it for around 30 seconds, it was now, i estimate in the airspace close to or directly over portland international airport.  at which time an object, from my perspective, crossed its path moving from the north west.

at first i thought it was a meteor, as it gave off a reddish glow that was getting slightly brighter. there was no fire trail, and instead of seeing it burn-up, the glow began dimming. before the glow disappeared it brightened again to the same intensity i had first seen. the red pulsating object was not very bright, in fact, had it not passed over the path of the jet i was initially watching, i might not have seen it at all.

the red glowing object pulsated from dimmest to brightest, and back to dimmest in about 1.5 seconds. this timing continued and was constant for the 10 to 12 seconds i witnessed the object.  it appeared to be traveling in a straight line heading south and slightly east. in, i would approximate the direction of california.

when i first saw the object, it was on my right side, to the west, somewhere over the portland international airport, a few miles west of my location.  after about 3 seconds it was directly south of me.  i was excited at this point, and was intensely watching.  another 3 seconds, and it was to the left of me, on my east side. from my perspective, the distance in the sky where i first witnessed this object to when it was directly to my south, was approximately how far it had traveled to the left, or the east of me.  

at this time, it now appeared to be moving directly away from me. this may indicate a course change to a more southerly heading. at this point the red pulsating glow of the object appeared to fade over the next 4 seconds, as it moved away from me at an extremely high rate of speed, and was then lost to light pollution on the horizon.

total time of sighting was about 10 seconds. the object was moving at such a high velocity as to make the jet i had been watching at the start: appear to be moving like a snail. furthermore, i would not be surprised if the ufo crossed oregon(from northern border to southern border), and reached california in 30 seconds.
content.summary: I was on my south facing porch smoking a cigarette, watching the sky, when a pulsating red glowing object moved through the sky at a high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside to see what my husband was doing (he was checking on a stump he had been burning) and as soon as i walked out from under the carport i heard a low, but still loud roar or rumble maybe of a plane-like object and when i looked up i saw an extremely large, long/narrow triangular shaped craft about to go directly over us. i yelled for my husband to look up and asked him what it was we were looking at and he just stood there speechless with me as we watched it fly very slowly over us. it was lower than any plane flies over out here, but not just that close (not just abover the trees or anything). from my view, i saw one red blinking light in sort of a square shape right in the center and 2 white lights closer to the end corners that never blinked. i could vaguely make out detailed compartments or pieces of the underside as it was right above my head and it slowly made its way across the sky past my view due to trees. my husband had enough tome to run and grab his rifle with a scope and look thru it and see the object up closer than i did, and said at the front (cockpit i suppose?) was 3 windows or something that were lit up from the inside, and describes the rest just as i did. we were astounded, never seeing anything like this before, and cannot figure out what it could be. we are assuming just some sort of military plane, but can't help but think ufo. we hope to get some sort of info, explanation or others near who might have seen the same thing.
content.summary: low plane like roar, lower flying very large long triangle shaped craft, 1 red square type light in center, 2 white lights near end corners

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were stargazing, watching and counting satellites. this object tracked in a straight line from the west to the east like a satellite , but it flashed bright then dim on approximately a 2 second cycle. i've watched satellites for many years and have not seen this flashing in the past. it was not an aircraft, most likely a satellite. i am curious to know what would cause it to flash.
content.summary: Satellite type object pulsing bright then dim on a 2 second cycle
